about.details:
Incorporated in 2022, Pattech Fitwell Tube Components Limited commenced its journey a decade ago in the year 2012. The company is engaged in the manufacturing of forging products for the non-automotive sector.

Pattech Fitwell has a total installed capacity of 14104.13 MTPA for manufacturing forged flanges, complex and specialized machined components, welded assemblies in the area of open die forgings. They convert semifinished/raw products to finished products by carrying out various value-added processes like forming, bending, drilling, cutting, inspection, polishing, painting, blasting, welding, punching, marking, testing, and packaging.

faqs.question: What is the Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO?
faqs.answer:
Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO is a SME IPO of 2400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹12.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹50 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on April 5, 2023, and closes on April 12, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO opens on April 5, 2023 and closes on April 12, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO?
faqs.answer: Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,50,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO will be done on Tuesday, April 18, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, April 20, 2023. Check the Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Pattech Fitwell Tube Components IPO listing date is on Friday, April 21, 2023.
